name: My Friend, Newt
description:
Meet your new best friend, Newt! A small little toy that wants to go on an adventure! But the outside world is very big and he needs your help. Help Newt train for his big adventure as you set up platforms to help him reach his goal.

An Assymetric VR Platformer Collectathon - Use your VR controllers to move Newt around as you manipulate the environment around you to help Newt collect Batteries & Coins scattered around your room.

This game has only been tested on Oculus Rift - May not work with HTC Vive or Valve Index, should work on Oculus Quest 2 through PC Link Cable

Controls:
- Push either the Left or Right Control sticks in, aim laser pointer at desired location - let go to teleport to said location
- Grab objects with the Grip Buttons
- Move Newt around with the Left Control stick
- Make Newt Jump with the A Button
